---
title: "COVIS"
format:
  html:
    theme: default
---

#### Libs

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

#### Data

```{r}
covis<- read_csv(here('data', 'processed_data', 'COVIS.csv'))
```

# Clean

```{r}
tx<-
  covis %>%
  filter(STATE %in% "TX")

vp_tx<-
  covis %>%
  filter(STATE %in% "TX",
         SpeciesDesignation %in% "PAR")

vv_tx<-
  covis %>%
  filter(STATE %in% "TX",
         SpeciesDesignation %in% "VUL")
```

# Plot

```{r}
tx %>% 
ggplot()+ geom_bar(
  aes(x = Year,
      color = SpeciesDesignation)
)
```

```{r}
vp_tx %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_bar(
    aes(x = Month,
        color = Year)
  )
```
